projects.name: Website Development for a Student Association

Deployed the application with Docker, configured Nginx as a reverse proxy in an Ubuntu server. Set up monitoring with Prometheus and Grafana, and performed load testing using Grafana k6. Utilized Cloudflare to enhance security and optimize performance.
